pullrequest.title: Fixes to Atlas limits and inertias

content.raw: So, we still have some unfortunate data duplication. We're currently using ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf; atlas.urdf has meshes for collisions. I don't know what the ideal solution is, but we should put this changes in atlas_simple_shapes.urdf at a minimum.
content.html: So, we still have some unfortunate data duplication. We're currently using ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf; atlas.urdf has meshes for collisions. I don't know what the ideal solution is, but we should put this changes in atlas_simple_shapes.urdf at a minimum.
